div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Mar. 22, 1920. FOR SOKOL'S GYMNASIUM IN RECICE

body.p: For the benefit of the Sokol Kardasova Recice Building Fund, the following contributions were deposited with Mrs. Frantiska Stejskal, 2509 South Hamlin Avenue: Mrs. F. Stejskal, $5; Mrs. Marie Mucek, $3; Mr. Vaclav Cizek, $8; Joseph Hulik, $2. It is worth-while mentioning that the above-mentioned contributors have been living in the United States for the past forty years.....
